variants.Description in input context: G309D, which was originally reported to be stable and properly localized in cells
L347P, which is of interest because it is present at an appreciable carrier frequency in the Philippines

Material used.Description: The study analyzed the effects of the mutations on protein stability and localization in cells.

Readout description.Molecular Effect: No significant impact on protein function or localization
Readout description.Result Description: The G309D mutation was reported to be stable and properly localized in cells.

Readout description.Molecular Effect: Differential effects on protein function and localization
Readout description.Result Description: The L347P mutation exhibited differential effects on protein function and localization compared to wild-type.
